snippet: Italy's Finmeccanica said on Tuesday it had reached a agreement with prosecutors to settle legal proceedings over a high profile helicopter contract between one of its units and India, adding this did not equal an acknowledgment of any wrongdoing....

headline.print_headline: Finmeccanica Settles With Italy Prosecutors to End Indian Chopper Deal Probe
headline.main: Finmeccanica Settles With Italy Prosecutors to End Indian Chopper Deal Probe

lead_paragraph: Italy's Finmeccanica said on Tuesday it had reached a agreement with prosecutors to settle legal proceedings over a high profile helicopter contract between one of its units and India, adding this did not equal an acknowledgment of any wrongdoing.
